meta.description: Terminal emulator which mimics the old cathode display

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 only
GNU General Public License v3.0 only

meta.long_description:
cool-retro-term is a terminal emulator which tries to mimic the look and
feel of the old cathode tube screens. It has been designed to be
eye-candy, customizable, and reasonably lightweight.
meta.name: cool-retro-term
